lines.text: From somewhere in the skies above us come, from time to time, flaming discs and weird phenomena. What are they? Whence have they come?
By means of a gas discovered by Professor Morgan, these two people have remained in suspended animation for five hundred years.
That makes me old enough to be my own great grandfather.
I don't understand, sir. Who is this man called Killer Kane?
He is the result of the stupidity of the men of your century. You failed to stamp out lawlessness and in the end the criminal became stronger than the law.
And you are the men I made counsellors of Earth? I would be better served by this Buck Rogers who walked through your men as if they were children.
I wouldn't call Dr. Huer exactly handsome, but I sure would give a lot to see his face right now.
